TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Sinvi, title = Sinvi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sinvi} }

S.FORM: Sinvi i Chiayi a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Sinvi. u kasalumaluma' nu Sinvi sa, 128 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 375 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 350 ku tademaw, pakalatu 93%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 25 ku tademaw, pakalatu 7%. u kasabinacadan, Cou 89%, Bunun 3%, Tayal 1%, Amis 1%.

Sinvi i Chiayi a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Sinvi. o kasalomaloma' no Sinvi sa, 128 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 375 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 350 ko tademaw, pakalato 93%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 25 ko tademaw, pakalato 7%. o kasabinacadan, Coo 89%, Bonon 3%, Tayal 1%, Amis 1%.
